articles.author: Devadyuti Das
articles.title: Asia Cup 2023: Sri Lanka Sets New World Record In ODI Cricket After Win Over Bangladesh In Opening Match - Zee News
articles.description: Sri Lanka posted their 11th consecutive win in ODI cricket as they defeated Bangladesh by five wickets to get their campaign in Asia Cup 2023 off to a winning start. The defending champions set a new world record with this win as no other team has won 11 succ…
